name: Lady of the Lake
description:
Note: Works best in full-screen mode

The hero needs a sword, and the Lady of the Lake can take care of that need! But she'll have to take care when delivering it, lest some misfortune befall the hero.

Point and click to navigate this level-based, golf-like game! Try to get the lowest score!

Controls:

Left-click: Hold to charge, release to throw

Right-click: Hold to scope

R key: Restart the level
